titleStmt.title: A pastoral letter written on the occasion of the death of the late Queen of England, of blessed memory with reflections on the greatness of that loss to Europe / by Peter Jurieu ...
titleStmt.author: Jurieu, Pierre, 1637-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Daniel Brown ... and Richard Baldwin ...,

notesStmt.note: Includes half-title page with title: Monsieur Peter Jurieu's pastoral letter on the death of the Queen.
Title page printed within mourning border.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
